content.detailedDescription: I was working and driving my cart down the cartpath to the next green i had to mow.  it was rainy and the sky was dark grey.  i looked to the path ahead and caught a flash ahead and slightly above me, i looked up and saw a softball size sphere that shone very bright yellow hovering just below the cloud bank. i estimated it was probably a few miles away and i kept eye contact for only a few seconds before my path took me into the tree line where i lost sight of it.  i told myself i would come out of the tree line and see it was a helicopter with a searchlight but maybe 5 seconds after losing sight of the object i came out of the tree line to find the object had vanished.  i don't believe it could have just flown out of view or into clouds at normal speed because it was so bright i was initially seeing it through dark rain clouds.  i'm still not sure what it was, if my mind was playing tricks on me than this was the most extreme example that i've ever experienced.
content.summary: On golf course working.  saw bright orb contrasted well against rainy sky. vanished after few seconds

content.detailedDescription:
This is a craft that flew right over our home. my wife was recording while my daughter and i were about a 1/4 of a mile away at the post office in fort ogden florida. before we went over there we saw a number of large white orbs flying from cloud to cloud, it was a full moon so they were easy to see at around 8pm. so i told my wife to go grab the camera and see if she could get any of them on film. while at the post office getting ready to get in our srx we everything lit up brighter then the moon light and we looked over and this craft was not 500 yards from us, not far above the tree tops moving very slow, it was bigger then a 747 easily and we heard no sound, it moved along a southern path across 17 highway right in front of us. then it turned like it steered like a car and went parallel to the highway and started to turn back  like it was going to head back over the highway then just vanished, not sure if it accelerated so fast we couldn't see it or literally vanished. we heard no sound from it and we headed home hoping that my wife was videoing and saw the craft. when we got home she was outside and said you won't believe what flew over the house and i said we were right next to it and tell me you got it on video and she said yes so here it is. she said she heard sound from it like a electrical whirl or buzzing sound but very low decibels. my daughter and i heard nothing . the video is unedited and uncut. my daughter and i both agreed that it was triangle shaped with some things  like arms coming off of it. when we saw it it had a ton of solid lit lights and some flashing strobes on the sides and some kind of spinning thing on it. we are sure there will be alot of reports because there was definitely more witnesses then just us 3. government secret craft or something else? you decide or if you know tell us because we are baffled by it.

extra note my wife heard a sound but she may have heard our aerators in the pond which makes a humming sound, it came right next to my daughter and i at the post office and it made no sound at all. we have lots of videos of strange craft and this one thats here almost ever night some nights it moves to a different location and is either 3 lights in a row or changes to one big orb
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Large triangle craft with arm like things

content.detailedDescription: 1 mintes   landings   bat  flyings   59 second  enconter  abduction  were were werw ere
content.summary: In   in   1 mintes landings 59 second   he   flyings   encoter  abduction

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
Last saturday evening (10-12-13), i saw something truly extraordinary!

it was just after 8pm and i was headed to york, pa on my motorcycle to surprise a old friend, in from california. it was pretty cloudy and i was taking a chance riding because odds were, it'd rain before i could get home. in any event, as soon as i pulled out of my driveway (just north of gettysburg), i saw it.

or, i should say - them! 

there were three very bright lights in the shape of a long, acute triangle - low in the sky, directly off to my right (after i turned left, onto the road). they were impossible to miss they were so bright! there wasn't another light in the sky and it looked as though they were moving! 

i kept glancing at them as i rode along and it was quite obvious they were individual lights, not part of some larger object or craft. it wasn't until i reached the 4-way intersection about 3/10's mile from my home, though, that i could tell they were indeed moving. they were headed almost due south, very slowly - maybe as slow as 5 or 10mph - with the light farthest from the two closer to each-other, in the lead; like a giant arrowhead moving across the sky! 

i was looking at them from the side, facing east, as they neared the roadway. i turned right at the intersection, heading right toward them and it wasn't long until i was nearly below them. 

i let off the throttle and was moving pretty slowly myself (maybe 15 mph,), listening as best i could over the rumble of my harley's exhaust. earlier this year, i'd seen other, similar lights, but none traveling in "formation". they were always solo and of pretty short duration. i was definitely excited and a bit nervous, but not afraid. i was not nearly this close for the other sightings and really wanted to see as much as possible; not knowing what would happen - but eager to find out! i called upon my infantry training to calm myself and take in as much detail as i could. like the others i've seen, these too had an orangish, amber-like hue, but these were closer and very bright; seeming almost to sparkle. it was much as though i was looking at them through running water, or something. they kind of rippled, i guess you could say. the had a slow pulsating effect as well which was steady and consistent - all three pulsing in unison, about every second or so. it was obvious at so close a distance, but i hadn't noticed it when i saw them from afar. i can't say they really "glowed", but it was very humid and they were very, very bright, so there was sort of a halo around them (for lack of a better word).

i was getting close but not yet underneath them when they seemed to slow. then, without warning, the first one "shrunk" and took off - straight up and through the low-hanging clouds - followed by the second one, immediately thereafter. i'd lost the first one as soon as it hit the clouds, but i could see the second one continue up, high into the atmosphere through a hole in the clouds, accelerating and growing dimmer and dimmer as it went. i was finally directly under where the first one had been when the third one too became only a small, dim light as well. i assume it shot up through the clouds too, but at that point i had to really pay attention to my riding because i'd already been looking up for far too long and was afraid i'd run off the road!

i should add that when they began their vertical assent, they didn't exactly "shoot" up. they just "went" straight up - not all that fast (at first). they did enter the clouds pretty quickly, though, so they must've already been a few hundred feet in altitude. if i had to guess, i'd say they were around 300-500 feet high, or so, and (at their "largest") i'd guess they were about six to ten feet in diameter, perhaps. when they "became small", they were maybe the size of a basketball. i admit that i'm really only guessing, though. i have no idea what the cloud level was - but, they were very low and dark - with small, open patches through which i could see the darkening sky above. as i said, it appeared the second one continued to accelerate, after it cleared the thick clouds and flew high into the atmosphere.

now, i didn't know what to think about all this, of course. i was hardly expecting to see something so dramatic (just leaving mu house!) and i was debating whether i should turn around and zoom back to my house to tell my wife (and hide?), or, if i should continue on my way. i decided to keep going until i reached a little gas-station/diner by rt 15 (hunterstown exit) where i pulled over to call my wife. i no sooner pulled in and turned to face home when another light appeared - or, more accurately, it was there when i turned around and looked. anyway, i kept watching it as i fumbled with my gloves, goggles and leather "snoopy cap" and, finally, managed to get my phone out from under my leather riding jacket. 

the light was moving south, just as the others had and i'd only just gotten my wife on the phone when it suddenly disappeared.

i was about 4 miles from where i'd seen the other lights, so i can't say what it actually did. it was simply too far to tell for sure - but, like the others, it was too bright to miss and it too was the only light of any kind in the sky. i was trying to bring my wife up to speed - lamenting that she'd missed such an amazing sighting - when another light suddenly appeared! it came out of nowhere - exactly where i'd first seen the one a moment before and almost certainly where i'd seen the others - and, it was also heading due south.

i was encouraging my wife to throw on some clothes (she was in bed!) and get out to see this one, at least, when it too disappeared - at the same spot the last one had!

i was already running pretty late, so i asked my wife to stay out for awhile and see if she spotted anything else, but i had to get on my way. we don't know if any more appeared as she went up/out for only a few minutes before heading back inside. it was getting a little chilly and she's deathly afraid of the dark (and absolutely hates being out at night w/o me there - even with our large dogs!). i wish she had stayed out for awhile, but she didn't. i did what i could; constantly scanning the skies on my way to york, but saw nothing else.

i'd like to add that i've seen more unexplainable lights and objects in the sky in these past six months than in my entire life put together - and i'm an outdoors kinda' guy and have always enjoyed looking at the night sky! this sighting was the most amazing i can remember, by far! i don't know what (if anything) all this recent activity means, but i'm going to be out there looking, every chance i get! you can count on it!

goodness knows, it sure beats watching the news!  :-(

*i'm including two pictures i made which are pretty accurate representations of the three lights i saw. i did them in photoshop, using landscapes and storm-clouds i snagged online (or, created myself) and assembled them into composite-illustrations - adding the ufos/lights as best as i could. they are not pictures of the location(s) where i saw the lights. i was just too lazy to go out and snap pictures. i'd have still needed to insert the skies and all anyway, so i didn't bother. the size of the lights (as they appear) is very close to accurate, however, and the pics look pretty close to the actual area where this occurred. the lights were definitely big, but i did have a hard time with the brightness and color (i'm read-green color deficient) and how do you make something in a picture bright and pulsating? still, the pics are pretty close to what i saw and should give the viewer a good idea of what they actually looked like. 

thank you. 

**oh! i did get caught in a torrential downpour on my way home and arrived soaked to the bone and frozen! it was worth it, though! i had a great time!
content.summary: Three bright & pulsating lights flying in formation "shrink" then accelerate upward, through clouds.

content.detailedDescription: There was four of us in the livingroom watching the football game, i was looking out the front window to the right of the tv screen and saw the ufo bright red/orange just hovering there for about 10 seconds when i jumped up and told the others to look at it.I opened the front door and we stood on the porch and watched it for maybe a good 10 minutes hovering over the town then go out to where the airport is hovering around there for awhile then continue on to the north north east. i have always believed in ufo's and to have actually see one and watch it i thought it was pretty cool to finely have the opportunity.
content.summary: Cone shaped,brigh/orange flashing lights white light on very bottom tip that  flashed intermitantly appeared to hover over the town then over the airport then continued to the north north east

content.detailedDescription: We have encountered many ships in the salt lake city area. we have many pictures. a very active area. we also back in 2005 were abducted my husband and i. this ship my husband noticed in the west sky of salt lake city. with are previous experiences throughout the years we knew exactly what we were seeing. a giant ball of light hovering over utah's west desert dwarfed all in coming commercial airlines. it had been a few years since we had any sightings of ufo in are area.We were excited. then it was gone.
content.summary: My husband had noticed the ship we both looked thur binoculers. and took pictures. it disappered at 20:21.

content.detailedDescription: I has out front in my garage and i was looking at the moon and notice air planes and police helicopter at a distance and at the same time i notice this light moving thats not flashing like air planes and helicopter do.Its was bright and moving fast till the light vanish.The air planes and helicopter i could still track them an see them.The light just vanish.
content.summary: Saw star looking object moving faster that the commercial airliners that fly by.

content.detailedDescription: I was watching a youtube clip titled "the tense debate between rep gohmert and a fox news anchor you don't want to miss".At 1:10 i noticed a disc-shaped object moving diagnally up and from right to left toward and over the capital building, leaving a trail behind it.I don't know if this was a video glitch, or if they were even showing a live shot in the background as they sometimes do, but hoping you guys can tell me more. i have seen footage exactly like this on youtube before, but still don't know if they are legitimate sightings either. please let me know what your opinion is if you have time to view the clip. it starts at 1:10, and lasts about 5-6 seconds. thanks for your time. ps: can send the clip if you have a hard time finding it.
content.summary: Saw a clip on youtube. during an interview the object appeared behind person being interviewed. don't know if it is a glitch, but can send clip to get your opinion.

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: My incounter started with this object in 1986 or 1987 and went till 1990. the first time i saw the object was during deer hunting in the high desert between calif. and nevada. late one night i had to urinate, steeping out the camp trailer i walked a short distance to relive myself, will standing facing the west i saw a large brilliant light , standing there in the buff trying to put a shape to this object or running lights i was unable to do ether. above me i could see a airliner in flight with strobes and hazard lights. i was comparing the two , one i new the other i did not. quite , slow , with a brilliant white light that came from every where, i was unable to give any structure just that the light was a sphere. a few days later i awoke felling good but a little tired from the before daylight hitting the trails till way after dark, my routine was to brush my teeth wash my face , arms in general a wash cloth bath.Wile washing my face i had very large deep red welt or bit mark on my left temple about the size of a quarter or slightly bigger. there was no pain no eratation if i had not seen it i would not have known about it. the men i hunted with said nothing about it and nether did i. this was to happen again in the next few years will hunting in the same area. for some reason i came to fear this object, just out side of camp is a small ridge, i became afraid of what was on the other side, i did not like the back side. the thing or what ever it was on my temple would have a large snow white scab that took from 4 to 5 weeks to disappear , i never picked at it or dug at it i left it alone. i have seen this light many times back in that country, something happened don't have clue. you may contact me by phone or email or mail, there is more to tell.
content.summary: Large light

content.detailedDescription: I was seven.Sitting cross legged, facing my two friends.The object was very shiney and looked like my uncles silver cigar case. it was far away and the sun was shining on it or it was emiting light. i was looking toward the east, by the time i pointed at it and yelled,"what's that?" and my 2 friends turned to look, it was gone. i was very aware of how fast airplanes flew in the 1940s, we used to watch planes fly in and out of ozwald field and even seatac. we lived within 10 miles of mcchord afb and i was used to seeing them and hearing them. this was so fast faster than anything i had seen in person or in the news reels at the movies.It appeared in my right line of sight,and flew perpendicularly straight above the earth it dissapeared to my left. it is the singular clearest memory of my childhood. i went right away to tell my mom, i might as well have told her i saw santa flying by. but two days later, she told me she had heard on the radio that a day meteor had been seen in several states that day. i thought she was lying to me, because i knew what meteors looked like, and that was not what i had seen.So many people laughed at me, that i stopped talking about it and never talked about it after that. the craft looked solid and reflective, it appeared to have sparkler like sparks falling out of the rear. i have allways known it was a ufo even though that title was not coined untill much later. soon the phrase, "flying saucer", hit our vocabulary, i thought i had been wrong, because what i had seen had not been that shape, years later, i saw some film that showed a saucer like ship, then the saucer turned so that only the side of it was turned to the camera, and behold, there was my cigar shape! from the day i saw it, there has been a solid assurance in my inner psychy, almost creepy, that "we are here, and we are staying". i have finally written it down, here for you, i feel relieved and vindicated as though a heavy weight has been lifted from my being. this is all true. sincerly linda langdon schulz born april 1940.
content.summary: Cigar shape.Afternoon.Going too fast for any thing flying in those days

content.detailedDescription: I was seven.Sitting cross legged, facing my two friends.The object was very shiney and looked like my uncles silver cigar case. it was far away and the sun was shining on it or it was emiting light. i was looking toward the east, by the time i pointed at it and yelled,"what's that?" and my 2 friends turned to look, it was gone. i was very aware of how fast airplanes flew in the 1940s, we used to watch planes fly in and out of ozwald field and even seatac. we lived within 10 miles of mcchord afb and i was used to seeing them and hearing them. this was so fast faster than anything i had seen in person or in the news reels at the movies.It appeared in my right line of sight,and flew perpendicularly straight above the earth it dissapeared to my left. it is the singular clearest memory of my childhood. i went right away to tell my mom, i might as well have told her i saw santa flying by. but two days later, she told me she had heard on the radio that a day meteor had been seen in several states that day. i thought she was lying to me, because i knew what meteors looked like, and that was not what i had seen.So many people laughed at me, that i stopped talking about it and never talked about it after that. the craft looked solid and reflective, it appeared to have sparkler like sparks falling out of the rear. i have allways known it was a ufo even though that title was not coined untill much later. soon the phrase, "flying saucer", hit our vocabulary, i thought i had been wrong, because what i had seen had not been that shape, years later, i saw some film that showed a saucer like ship, then the saucer turned so that only the side of it was turned to the camera, and behold, there was my cigar shape! from the day i saw it, there has been a solid assurance in my inner psychy, almost creepy, that "we are here, and we are staying". i have finally written it down, here for you, i feel relieved and vindicated as though a heavy weight has been lifted from my being. this is all true. sincerly linda langdon schulz born april 1940.
content.summary: Cigar shape.Afternoon.Going too fast for any thing flying in those days

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i have had several things happens to us in the course of our marriage which are unexplainable, and since all the new tv shows about aliens; we feel it is ok to talk about this now. 

in colorado we have lost time, and distance while driving from colorado springs, colorado to alamos, colorado. we have seen ufo ships; as all this was in 1999. we had one strange event when we moved to florida, and now that we live in on a very large farm in strathmore, california it seems to be getting stranger each year; as we have lived on this farm since june 1, 2010. i have recorded strange voices, interferences, on my cell-phone, and my husband has seen lights hovering over our water meter, and both of us have seen red and blue lights right over our home; and a perhaps a ufo hovering for a longtime and then coming back. we only lost time and space once that we know of, however i have had marks on my stomach a type of an attack in colorado in 1999 that i thought may have happened within inside my home, but now i am not so sure. i am a christian so i went to my pastor about this, but maybe it was something else. i still have the marks on my stomach." there is a lot more, but i am very uncomfortable right now talking about this. i have also had dreams about the same type of (unknown) on tv they call them the grey, several times, but my dreams were not bad at all, not like on tv. they were nice and needy. calm and seemed very concerned. every time i used my cell-phone i would get major interference, and now the darn things do not work, and we had to buy news one. it is if the ufo burned them out; i am not sure. i still have the phones. the 4th video that night evening was scary, please look at the 4th one though out the while thing. i heard a some sounds outside, so i got my phone, now i did not see anything, but when i uploaded it; this is what i got.
content.summary: It burned out both cell-phones and we had to buy news one. we are out in the middle of no where; see below

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Solemos ir a la monta���a de noche donde no hay contaminaci���n lum���nica y recitando mantram y intentando estar en la frecuencia y lo m���s despejado mentalmente, meditando previamente. hemos visto m���s de 10 luces algunas m���s grandes que otras, la m���s grande fue como un faro, del mismo tama���o visual que tenemos de la luna. saludos.
content.summary: Ufo`s & lights in mallorca!

content.detailedDescription: It was about (11:40) last tuesday (10/15/2013) i was watching t.V. when i heard a loud pulsating humming sound, as soon as i heard the sound i ran outside to see what it was. when i was outside i was stunned to see a large triangular craft with 1 white light on each point of the object, the craft was about 75 feet away from me and about 50 feet in length. the reason that i was so shocked was because i have been hearing this humming sound every night for the past week and every time i heard it i passed it off as being the a.C. unit on the back side of our house, but sense i saw the object i have stopped hearing the sound. also this has not been the first time i have seen the object and i am not the only one who has seen it, my older brother my father  and my little sister have described the same object to me and they have claimed to see it right over my house in the same place that i had seen it. the most recent time that i had seen the object other than this time was in 2008 i don���t remember the month but it was in the summer, it was hovering over my house then heading in the same direction that it had all the other times that i had seen it. almost every person in my family has seen this object or a similar one in their life time.
content.summary: I heard an odd sound outside so i got of my sofa to go check it out and when i was outside there was a craft hvering above my house.

content.detailedDescription: As my previous report i forgot to include some details regarding the picture i took of the object,since as you would see there is 2 lights one is the object and the other light is the fountain light that seats in the middle of the cagans crossing's lake.Well i will start with how me and my 16 year old son witnessed this event unfold.Me and my son were parked in the kentucky fried chicken parking lot when suddenly my son calls out for my attention to look towards walmart.Three very bright white lights came up from the heavily wooded area behind walmart.This three lights were pulsating as they moved towards us and moving in a zig-zagging motion.This lights went over our van and when it got over highway 27 going across to cagans crossing they stopped and hovered for a second then they went backwards hovered for a second (in a blink of an eye this lights did this),then they moved forward and kept moving towards cagans crossing.Me and my son fallowed this lights and saw as they were in motion the three lights turned into one big very bright white light in the shape of a sphere.We couldn't tell if there were any occupants or the color of the object or even the shape since this lights were blinding it like camouflaged the object.We assumed the object was in the shape of a sphere judging by the shape of this lights.Me and son fallowed the now one big light to the cagans crossing lake were it stopped.Once it stopped the light hovered over the lake about the tree top height near the fountain and then descended very slowly lower to mid three height.This light hovered about 10-15 minutes and disappeared.There was never any sound coming from this objects even after it turned into one big light and there were no other lights on it that would tell if it was a plane of any kind or a helicopter.The big bright white light in a sphere shape located on the left of the picture as you would observe is the object and the yellowish orange light sitting lower on the right side of the picture is the lake's fountain.I want to also add that this is not the only time we have witnessed strange lights or objects in this area.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo sighting on highway 27 between walmart and cagans crossing in clermont fl

content.detailedDescription:
i was leaning outside my window (smoking) watching leaves flutter in the sky (from an updraft) when i saw an object as bright as venus moving into my line of sight, moving westward. i could not tell the elevation. it was relatively cloudless so there was nothing to scale. i watched it as it flew in an arc like direction and vanished over the treeline to the south (sse possibly). i heard no sound at all from it. it was quite bright. whether it was glowing or if it was reflecting the sun, i could not tell. it was only in my sight for about 10 seconds. approximately 15 seconds later i saw a piper cub type plane flying in a westerly direction. the object i saw appeared to be at a higher altitude than the plane. i could hear the prop sound of the plane very clearly.
 it was moving pretty fast to cover such a span of skyline in a matter of a few seconds. at first i thought it was a plane, but it was too quiet and too fast. i also thought it was a satellite as i've seen them reflect the sun as they pass over.
content.summary: Object made a long arc directional change

content.detailedDescription: Last night my husband yelled for me and our boys to come out to the balcony to see something. we always stand out there at all times because of our amazing view. when i came out we watched 5 of these bright orbs that made no sound at all fly by slowly. each one showed up within 30 seconds of each other. when one would be out of view for the 30 seconds the next would come over the horizon. i have seen every type of plane or air craft fly over and around my home. this is like nothing i ever seen! they were glowing so bright! i have no idea what it was!
content.summary: 5 glowing red balls over worcester seconds apart.

content.detailedDescription: At 2:00 am i had been watching tv when i heard a stray dog that hangs out in the neighborhood screeching and running down the street . i went to the kitchen window to see what the problem was and as i looked out the window i noticed what at first i thought was a bright star in the sky to the south east but as i stood looking at it i realized that not only was it too bright to be a star but there was at least 5 lights across that were moving . at first the lights seemed to be flashing but then they were moving across the object .Then it  looked as though the lights would separate and then go back together  i watched it for several minutes to make sure of what i was seeing . i was excited about seeing the lights but also a little fearful .I called my daughter who lives around the corner from me and told her what i was looking at and we decided to meet at the corner so that she could see it too and make sure i wasn't looking at just bright stars. as i walked out my door and out into the street i realized that there was another one to the west of the first one and as i walked to the corner i saw another one they were not close together but i am not sure how far apart they were . when my daughter met me she verified that what i was seeing was not stars . she brought her camera and tried to get pictures and video but her camera didn't have a very far range zoom . i don't have a video camera any longer since i loaned it to someone about 4 years ago and have not seen it since . don't ever loan a video camera to someone who you cannot trust cause you never know when you may need it . we stood for about 30 minutes watching the ufos and the first one seemed to be getting closer as we watched it . the third one was slowly moving back and the second one to the west looked as though it was moving closer as well . when we saw them getting closer we decided it was time to go inside and we went home in a hurry. the ufos were moving really slowly as though they were looking for something or watching something . that's just our observation .When i came back into the house i went to look out the window to see where they were and the first one was directly overhead and i could not see the other ones . after a few minutes the first one slowly moved on till i could no longer see it . this is not the first sighting that i have had nor the second . a couple of years ago as my mother and i were returning home we saw a cloud , the only cloud in the sky and it was shaped like a saucer . it was sitting directly over a small pasture . then some time after that i'm not sure how long but we saw it again , the cloud shaped like a saucer . it was strange the way it was shaped both times and both times it was the only cloud in the sky but it wasn't that high up in the sky . i know what my daughter and i saw this morning are ufos there were no planes or helicopters in the sky and i have never seen an airplane or helicopter just sit in one place for very long .Also i have never felt fear at seeing airplanes or helicopters .
content.summary: My daughter and i saw the first set of lights out the kitchen window went outside to make sure we were not looking at stars

content.detailedDescription: So 2 years ago i was in saudi arabia to do "umrah" muslims do it, anyway, i was taking pictures and at first when i saw them 2 years later which is now, i thought it was the light, but when i moved back to take pics ( note: i didnt even know there was a ufo there..I was just taking pics of the 2 minarets, luckily i took more pics) , i saw windows in the photo as you can see and little light bulbs and it was just so weird....Looks like it was flying down. maybe the human eye cant see it? i dont know. i cant answer a few questions that it says like how did you feel and all because i didnt know it was there. so....I am not sure what it is...Dont hate.  please tell me what you think!
content.summary: Over a mosque, i didnt see, camera caught it

content.detailedDescription: This sighting happened in south clermont fl.Me and my 16 year old son were parked at the kentucky fried chicken parking lot,when suddenly my 16 year old calls for my attention to look at this very bright white lights that came up behind the walmart.At first there were 3 lights then eventually the 3 lights turned into one.This  sphere lights were zig-zagging towards us.It headed across 27 towards cagans crossing the object stopped it went backwords stopped and it moved forward and it just continued in the path towards cagans crossing in a zig-zagging motion.Me and my son were fallowing what at that point had turned into one solid very bright white light.It went towards the cagans crossing lake,once there it hovered for 10 minutes.The bright white light started dying down until it was all gone.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo sighting in south clermont four corners area.

content.detailedDescription:
1. where were you and what were you doing at the time?

on october 17, 2013 at around 7:10 p.M. (asia/manila time), two of us were lounging at our balcony. our property is on the 10th floor of a residential building.    


2. what made you first notice the object?

the lights appeared out of nowhere.  the sky was dark and there were no clouds. 


3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it?

at first we thought about a flock of birds, but decided it couldn't have been because the pieces were very large and the lights were too bright.  


4. describe the object and its actions and motions in detail.

we saw smokey, shimmering lights (like several large pieces of glass) wobbling or undulating across the sky in a wave-like motion.  it's like seeing a ray of sun hit a lake.  the over-all shape or formation was a parallelogram. it was as if something was going wrong with the flying object's invisible  field.  

we estimated the size of the parallelogram to be about 15 jumbo planes put together (three rows, five planes per row).


5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object.

dumb-founded. 


6. how did you lose sight of the object?

it moved across the sky like a wave for about 30 seconds. it disappeared and then reappeared after about two seconds.  it moved again before totally diappearing. 

total time: about 40 seconds
content.summary: We saw smokey, shimmering lights (like several large pieces of glass) wobbling or undulating across the sky in a wave-like motion.

on october 17, 2013 at around 7:10 p.M. (asia/manila time), two of us were lounging at our balcony. our property is on the 10th floor of a residential building.    


2. what made you first notice the object?

content.detailedDescription: I have seen bright metal flash above the surface about three or four more times what or who is orbiting the moon
content.summary: Right  metal flash about size of a basketball seen three or four more times  at equater

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling on highway 11 w. heading towards the city limits of bristol, tn. i observed what i believed to be a helicopter traveling across the night sky. it was moving at a decent speed and had a bright light. catching my attention, i scanned the night sky. shortly after, i saw three bright lights that appeared to be in a horizontal row. at first i thought they were lights from a radio tower or something. i thought this because they appeared to be stationary and not moving. they didn't flash or anything. just three bright lights lined up in a horizontal row. as i got closer to the lights; i noticed there was no radio tower under the lights. i wasn't too emotional just curious as to what they were. after i passed them, i pulled over at a gas station. i got out of my car and looked up but they were nowhere to be found.
content.summary: Three bright lights lined up in a horizontal row.

content.detailedDescription: Driving south to mesquite  on highway 318 and noticed as the sun was setting 3 bright lights on the horizon. we thought they were jets, but the stayed stationary and never moved. i watched them till the sun finally set. what got our attention the most was that the 3 lights were in a perfect row, staying stationary.
content.summary: 3 bright lights in a row

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
We like to go out and observe the night sky often. we are quite familiar with how airplanes look in the night sky. where we live we hear and see many commercial airlines come and go. the objects, ufos, we witnessed tonight were unlike the normal things you see. 
it was my husbands first time seeing this orb like brilliant phenomenon that i have now witnessed a few times.
715pm est 
i had a feeling i just needed to go outside and look at the sky. after seeing some of the orbs over this past summer i wanted to see if they would appear yet again tonight. i meditated while my husband gathered blankets and items to prepare for a night of star gazing. 
as i meditated and wished to see my bright stunning light in the sky i opened my eyes and noticed a bright star above the treeline westerly. there it sat and i just thought "hmm thats bright and wow it almost seems to be moving but meh maybe im staring at it to hard. hmm weird it seems to have a glowing red flash too.." however this starlike object just remained stationary over the trees for half an hour. 
during this half hour we witnessed at least 5 planes, with sound coming and going, probably from portland jet port in maine. saw 3 shooting stars. then witnessed a satellite moving gracefully across the sky.
looked back at the westerly object and noticed it was no longer as bright, almost seemed as if it was further away. the object was now a lot lower than it was half an hour ago. it had moved below the treeline and more to the west. over the course of 30 more mins we noticed more planes, then we noticed some very weird unexplainable pulsating ruby red objects moving on a steady course very near to the descending star-like object. (not sure never seen airplanes blink like this) 
around 8:15 an hour later the star-like went from above the treeline appearing steady, then moved below the treeline down to the right. by 815ish the star was completely gone and too far below the treeline to observe it any longer. 
8:20 my feet are getting a bit cold and im ready to come in. i close my eyes and start to say thank you, thank you if you showed yourself to me again... then as i opened my eyes i yelled 
"tyrone!! look at this! they are here again! omg thank you thank you!!"
this giant orb was so brilliant. it was as if someone was shining a beautiful light in our direction saying "hello i am here" we both felt so wonderful and watched in awe as this object pulsated, did not move. this beautiful object was right above our neighbors chimney. it stayed still for a good minute. as i told my husband this is what i've seen before but in the past it was only for 30 sec or less and just totally evaporated or dimmed out. however tonight it just incandescently glowed and was brighter than any other star in the night sky. much brighter than venus! 
then the object moved up! ascended in elevation than dimmed but then just appeared like a bright object. the white/yellow light was now still and the object moved course horizontally heading southwest. 
i followed them around a house and noticed this object was now blinking. no sound! and then appeared another one! stationary. no sound this second light source object started to ascend and take off in a southwest trajectory. what is weird as when they are still and very close to us there is no sound and no blinking lights. 
i feel so blessed to have seen this tonight. they are there. i really believe if you give out your energy/beacon they will respond. 

my husband is still sitting here flabbergasted.. xd
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Brilliant intense stationary light observed hovering then transforming while taking a new flight path. attended by other unknown objects..

content.detailedDescription: All i can say is that the lights i saw a long with my witness is that every year this happens from ealy summer till the end of october and every year i reported.What ever it is it seems to have the ability to communicate every time you flash a flash light at it.It will flash its self at you more than once its cool to see it and expirence it.I have a theory on ufos i think the more problems humanaty has the more of this ufos we will hitness.

content.detailedDescription: It was noontime i was outside , i let a hellium ballon go  and then the ufo object came out  out of the clouds it was fast too fast  big very big  ,no sound  it was clear. , radar can't detec ,technology ,that we have now , the government  have this technology now . there is no doubt that we have their technology ,i know how t works , i can make a replica of a ufo ,and how it works and the disign inside, if you want more info text me at 9786023311"
content.summary: Big  fast very fast no sound

content.detailedDescription: My wife spotted the craft while letting dog out into back yard. she called me and i managed to get 2 still shots and a short video of it with my cell phone. i have some piloting experience with small aircraft and this was not anything i recognized. the craft made no sound and appeared to be a bloom of light that altered course as it flew from the west to east then turned slowly to the south east. the craft then increased altitude until it went out of sight. the lights that it emitted changed color fluctuating into different shades of red orange and yellow. if you have additional questions or would like to speak to me about the incident send me an email.
content.summary: A soundless aircraft that bloomed light not navigation lights

content.detailedDescription:
i was driving north on highway 55 near herculaneum missouri when i seen two sets of lights in the distance. the first set of orange lights were boomerang shaped with one orange light in front and one orange light at the back of each arm and one light in the middle of each arm. to the side and behind me about fifty feet i saw more orange lights shaped like an upside down 30 degree angle. there was one orange light on the front, one on each end, and one in the middle of the upside down v like shape. traveling from the north east towards the south west both crafts came over my car. they took about 45 seconds to pass over and were approximately 500 feet above me. i pulled over and watched the lights pass. i could not see any thing in between the two and i could not hear anything. the lights stayed in a steady motion appearing to go about 50-70 miles an hour with traffic traveling out of sight over the horizon. after seeing this i just wanted to forget all about it i saw my first ufo in approximately 1974, and i still cant get that one out of mind. seeing these last two ufos about a month and a half ago and not being able to get it out of my mind i decided to look on the internet to be able to share my story and found mufon.
                    thank you
             
    october 17, 2013.
content.summary: Seen boomerang type object with 5 ligts     on side and behnd  a  30 degree    v  with light in mddle   5 lights    making v
